title: Cross-Chain NFT Minting with RIP-7755
description: Explore the power of RIP-7755 by creating a practical cross-chain NFT minting application! In this workshop, you'll develop a full-stack application that enables users to purchase and mint NFTs on Arbitrum using funds from Base. We'll guide you through writing and deploying Solidity contracts on both chains and building a user-friendly frontend minting interface.
